trans-unit.source: Represents a user identity authenticated using forms authentication.
trans-unit.target: 폼 인증 중에 인증된 사용자 ID를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity> class is used by the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> when a user is authenticated with forms authentication.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity> 클래스에서 사용 되는 <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> 폼 인증으로 사용자가 인증 하는 경우.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity> class is created using the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket> that is decrypted from the forms-authentication cookie or from the URL.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스는 <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity> 클래스를 사용 하 여 만들어집니다는 <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket> URL 또는 폼 인증 쿠키에서 하는 암호가 해독 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The new instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity> class is used to construct a new <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> object that is set as the value of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property for the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스는 <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity> 클래스 사용 하는 새 생성 <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> 의 값으로 설정 된 개체는 <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> 속성에 대 한 현재 <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example generates a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket> and then uses it to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity> class, based on whether the user supplies the correct user name and password on the form.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 생성 한 <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket> 다음의 인스턴스를 만들고 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity> 사용자 올바른 사용자 이름 및 폼에 암호를 제공 하는 여부에 따라 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity" /> class.
The authentication ticket upon which this identity is based.
trans-unit.target: 이 ID의 기반이 된 인증 티켓

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity" /> class.
The identity upon which this identity is based.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity" /> class based on the specified identity.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 ID를 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of authenticated identity.
The type of authenticated identity.
This property always returns "Forms".
Gets the collection of claims that are associated with this identity.
trans-unit.target: 이 ID와 연결된 클레임의 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The collection of claims.
Gets a copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity" /> instance.
A copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity" /> instance.
Gets a value that indicates whether authentication took place.
This property always returns <see langword="true" />.
Gets the user name of the forms identity.
The user name of the forms identity.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity.Name%2A> property returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket.Name%2A> property from the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket> supplied to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity.Name%2A> 속성의 값을 반환 된 <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket.Name%2A> 속성은 <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket> 생성자에 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket" /> for the forms-authentication user identity.

The <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket" /> supplied to the <see cref="M:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity.#ctor(System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket)" /> constructor for the current object.
